entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
